name: Enchanterelle
description:
This game was produced for the Tavern Game Jam: January Edition (2023)! It is a simple idle crafting game intended to be relaxing, pleasant. There is no set plot or end point, it is purely an idle game.
It is in part an antithesis to my previous work (which relied on quite a few words while this game has nearly none).

This game is still in development, and will be undergoing significant changes in the next week. Features to come include a wandering NPC who appears in random locations, art improvements, and bug fixes.

Please note: this game plays in your browser! The download button is only for documentation, otherwise just click play.
